product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Lensatic Compass - Special Buy
long_description: With its compact, folding design and shock-resistant case, the Ultimate Survival Technologies Lensatic Compass should accompany you on all your hiking, camping or orienteering adventures. Directional letters glow in the dark for increased visibility; compass also features easy-to-read bearing markers. Liquid compass and precision alignment deliver accurate readings; adjustable lens offers dependable sighting. Special buy.
